usa: The Church Committee, Chaired by Idaho Senator Frank Church, was established in the aftermath of the Watergate Scandal; investigating the illegal activities of the CIA, NSA and FBI.[465]
Bill Gates founded Microsoft Corporation.<sup id="cite_ref-466" class="reference">[466]</sup>
Fall of Saigon: Saigon, the capitol of South Vietnam, was captured by the People's Army of Vietnam and the Viet Cong, causing the South to surrender and officially ending the Vietnam War.[467]
Apollo–Soyuz Test Project: The first joint U.S.–Soviet space mission began in Kazakhstan.[468]
President Ford was uninjured after a failed assassination attempt by Manson Family cult member Lynette Fromme in Sacramento, California.<sup id="cite_ref-469" class="reference">[469]</sup>
